point1.reason: We just got through a year of COVID. I am excited to start DES 157, but wish it was in person. :/

point2.reason: I went hiking in Auburn. It feels good to lose myself in the silence and the trees.

point3.reason: The second wave of COVID has just started in my home country, India. Cases are rising rapidly.

point4.reason: I just lost a close family member. Rest in peace... :(

point5.reason: I'm healing. I occupy myself with work every day to stay sane. I am grateful for the opportunities I have to get better.

point6.reason: I just got vaccinated. We'll all be out of quarantine and back to our lives soon.

point8.reason: I took a trip to Yosemite. With no phone service, I was able to connect with nature. I even fell into a waterfall, and this was one of the best experiences of my life! :P

point9.reason: We're going back to in-person classes! And I will be tutoring DES 157A. :)

point10.reason: I'm super busy with classes, and that's just the way I like it! I'm really enjoying this quarter back on campus. :D

point11.reason: Thanksgiving is here! I am thankful for friends, family, and my wonderful college education.

point12.reason: We are on the road to recovery. I am celebrating Christmas and New Year with my family. Also...I got my first job offer!
